name: Viaje - Honey & Hand Grenades - The Shiv
additionalNotes:
Founded in 2008 by brand owner Andre Farkas, Viaje has grown to a massive portfolio of top-rated blends that are all made in small batch limited releases. The blends range all the way from mellow-medium to full bodied and use top-self tobaccos for the long fillers, binders, and wrappers, all of which 
Viaje is a boutique cigar company the specializes in small-batch, high-quality cigars. The defining characteristic of Viaje handmade premium cigars is quality. Every single blend from Viaje is made in small batches to ensure that every stick has top-notch construction, consistency, and attention to detail, so that connoisseurs get a perfect smoke from each top-shelf cigar.
